extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Avalanche MDM Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Avalanche MDM version is before 6.4.3 to determine if the system is affected.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Avalanche MDM version before 6.4.3?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Avalanche MDM to Version 6.4.3 or Later
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Avalanche MDM to the fixed version 6.4.3 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.
